participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and caring, Michael loves sharing his experiences and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: I am a pilot for southwest. I have a twin sister named Jessica. I met my wife at a Tickleback concert. My favorite food is fried chicken. My son was born completely blind.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Curious and energetic, Liam enjoys exploring new things and is always eager to make new friends.
participant_2.background: I am seven years old. I just got my rejection letter from the gifted program. And, my best friend is Calden. I like to play soccer.

content.text: Hi, my name is (USER 1's name).
Hi, my name is (USER 2's name).
What's your favorite food?
I like fried chicken.
Me too! I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines, and I always fly back home to get fried chicken from my favorite place.
Wow, that's so cool! I've always wanted to fly a plane.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be challenging.
I bet! But I'm sure it's worth it.
It is. I love being able to travel and see new places.
That's great! I love to travel too.
What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I've been to a lot of great places, but my favorite was probably Hawaii.
Hawaii is beautiful! I've always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go! It's amazing.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer, read, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I like to do those things too.
Cool! We should hang out sometime.
I'd love that!
